reviewText: These cd's were too boring for my 4 yr old grandson.  Too much talking and not enough action.  He compared all that I bought with his crunch/tear cd from mighty machines and they didn't even come close to action watching.

If you have a little boy (or girl) that loves machinery and construction equipment, these are movies for them! We own a couple other of the Mighty Machine DVDs and my 2 year old loves them.  Lots of live action shots of actual equipment at work and cute little voice overs for the machines themselves.
